Uses of Interface
com.linecorp.armeria.client.RemoteInvoker

  • Packages that use RemoteInvoker 
    Package Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.client
    Client core.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.routing  
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.tracing
    Provides distributed tracing decorators for armeria clients using Brave, a Java tracing library compatible with Zipkin.

      class  EndpointGroupInvoker 
      Constructors in com.linecorp.armeria.client.routing with parameters of type RemoteInvoker 
      Constructor and Description
      EndpointGroupInvoker(RemoteInvoker delegate, String groupName)
      Creates a new instance that decorates the specified RemoteInvoker, such that invocations are made against one of the endpoints in end EndpointGroup named groupName.
